SELECT AR.AGE_RANGE_DESC AS Age_Range, SUM ( FOI.NUM_UNITS ) AS Units_Sold, ROUND(SUM ( coalesce(FOI.RPT_SALES_VALUE + FOI.RPT_DISCOUNTS,0) ),cur.decimalplaces) AS Sales_Value, FOI.REPORT_CURRENCY AS Currency FROM WCA.FACT_ORDERITEMS FOI, WCA.MEMBER M, WCA.AGE_RANGE_REF AR, WCA.PERIOD P, WCA.CURFORMAT CUR WHERE (FOI.STORE_ID IN ({storeent_id}) AND FOI.MEMBER_ID=M.MEMBER_ID AND p.calendar_date >= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({StartDate})$ AND p.calendar_date <= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({EndDate})$ AND AR.AGE_RANGE_ID=M.AGE_RANGE_ID AND AR.LANGUAGE_ID IN ({lang_id}) AND P.PER_ID=FOI.PER_ID) AND (FOI.ORDER_STATUS_ID IN ( SELECT INTEGER(PR.PARAM_VALUE) FROM WCA.PARAMETERS PR WHERE PR.PARAM_TYPE in ('ORDER_STATUS_SUBMITTED','ORDER_STATUS_SHIPPED'))) AND ( CUR.CURFORMAT_ID = ( SELECT MAX(DISTINCT CURFORM.CURFORMAT_ID) FROM WCA.CURFORMAT CURFORM WHERE FOI.REPORT_CURRENCY= CURFORM.SETCCURR) ) GROUP BY AR.AGE_RANGE_DESC, FOI.REPORT_CURRENCY, CUR.DECIMALPLACES
ORDER BY {sortBy} {sortOrder}
